title: A loyal tear dropt on the vault of our late martyred sovereign in an anniversary sermon on the day of his murther.
author: Glanvill, Joseph, 1636-1680.
publisher: Printed by E. Cotes, and are to be sold by James Collins ...,
notes: Caption title: A fast sermon on the kings myrtyrdom.
